Subject: Unable to connect to EPP console
Description: Hello, We have deployed EPP in our on-premises instance. While we are able to ping the IP address, we are unable to connect to the console via the web. Although the frontend screen displays options 1 through 5 can be seen If I restart the VM i can see an error "failed to start A high per....er and a reverse proxy server." Unfortunately I cannot see attachment section here so if you email me on dipesh.ramesh@pwc.com I can attach the error message We do have support purchase for this application so happy to provide proof if require. Thanks
What_We_Know__c: We asked the customer to check if they attached 2 NIC's to the EPP VM
Solution_Comment__c: The server was initially configured with only one Network Adapter. We informed the customer about the necessity to add a second one and this solved the reported issue.
